definition: ancient bronze wine holder with 3 legs and loop handle/nobility

sentences.english: Lord Ruthven died, and some of his friends ran away.
sentences.chinese: 結果魯斯溫勳爵死了，他的一些朋友逃走了。

sentences.english: Lord Kelvin was missing half the story.
sentences.chinese: 開爾文勳爵少算了一半。

sentences.english: Lord Mandelson extended warm welcome to Ambassador Liu for assuming his new post in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 曼德爾森勳爵熱烈歡迎劉大使來英履新。

sentences.english: Lady Furness left us and we began to talk .
sentences.chinese: 弗內斯勳爵夫人走開了，我們交談起來。

sentences.english: It was Ovett in particular who helped drive Coe on to new heights.
sentences.chinese: 科勳爵能不斷受到激勵創下新高，尤其要感謝奧維特。

sentences.english: Lord Heney stretched himself out on the divan and laughed.
sentences.chinese: 亨利勳爵伸手攤腳地躺在沙發上，笑着。

sentences.english: Lord Henry turned and looked at the duchess with his slumberous eyes .
sentences.chinese: 亨利勳爵轉過頭來，用倦怠的眼睛望着公爵夫人。

sentences.english: Then I went downstairs with Lord Bothwell.
sentences.chinese: 於是我和博思韋爾勳爵下了樓。

sentences.english: Lord Hertford’s reputation as a discerning, major collector was secured.
sentences.chinese: 赫特福德勳爵獨具慧眼的大收藏家聲譽從此開始確立。

sentences.english: Lord Henry elevated his eyebrows and looked at him in amazement.
sentences.chinese: 享利勳爵揚起眉毛，驚奇地瞧着他。

sentences.english: ‘Come on, my lord, ’I said to Bothwell.‘Our
sentences.chinese: “衝吧，我的勳爵，”我對博思韋爾說道。

sentences.english: O I fear you are poisoned, Lord Randal, my son!
sentences.chinese: 奧，倫德爾勳爵，我的兒，我恐怕你已中毒？

sentences.english: Professional photographer Lord Snowdon won its Hood Medal in 1978.
sentences.chinese: 專業攝影師斯諾頓勳爵在1978年獲得了胡德獎章。

sentences.english: Lord Swan was made a life peer in 1981.
sentences.chinese: 斯旺勳爵於1981年受封終身貴族。

sentences.english: In a scuffle that ensued, Leia killed Lord Tion.
sentences.chinese: 隨後便發生了一場混戰，萊婭殺死了蒂翁勳爵。

sentences.english: Lyra is with her uncle, Lord Asriel.
sentences.chinese: 萊拉同她的叔叔阿斯利爾勳爵在一起。
